description: A light-hearted story about Max's humorous struggle in the bakery and Olivia's reactions, illustrating the punchline about making dough.
title: Dough Dilemma
n_1: Max is diligently kneading dough in the bakery, Olivia watches.
n_2: Max struggles with the sticky dough, Olivia observes curiously.
n_3: Max, frustrated, covered in dough; Olivia tries not to laugh.
n_4: Both share a laugh, the doughy mess forgotten for a moment.
c1_1: Baking is harder than it looks!
c1_3: I guess I'm not cut out for this.
c1_4: Who needs dough when I have laughter?
